description: Information highlighting what TfL are doing for IWD

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We are committed to supporting and celebrating gender equality and diversity in the workplace, and across London."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

This year, with support from Siemens, we are running a programme of employee events to celebrate International Women's Day 2018 and are calling on our staff, and Londoners, to help forge a more inclusive, gender equal world. The theme for this year's International Women's Day is #PressforProgress. Find out more .

Siemens believe diversity enhances creativity and innovation, so are delighted to partner with Transport for London to celebrate International Women's Day 2018. Find out more about Siemens' approach to diversity and career opportunities with them.

Our International Women's Day events build on the legacy of our Women in Transport programme which aims to attract more women to the transport industry. Find out more about our Women in Transport programme.

We offer a range of exciting career opportunities at TfL, including apprenticeships , and are keen to bring women and young people from a diverse range of backgrounds into the business and help them forge fascinating careers.
Find out more about our career opportunities .
